comment.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Qv5awtI9tzw&t=10s](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3DQv5awtI9tzw%26t%3D10s) ### Comment > Adguard appears to work once, if I am lucky. After that once, it does not appear to work at all. Every subsequent window or tab I open in Youtube has ads. Often the video will not run, it is stopped on the first part of an ad. Refreshing the window simply changes the ad. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/vfLWkC9.png)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Safari v1.11.13 Browser: | Safari Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection

Social Widgets:
AdGuard Social Media

Annoyances:
AdGuard Cookie Notices,
AdGuard Popups,
AdGuard Mobile App Banners,
AdGuard Other Annoyances,
AdGuard Widgets Other extensions used: | Duplicate
